title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
description: Straight repeat the full width of fabric containing on the left a woman on horseback with a dog at her side, and a crouching jaguar; on the right a man on horseback and two running deer.  These four groupings are surrounded by large-scale floral motifs. Predominantly red, pink, and ivory tones on a dark brown background.
name: Textile
